title: Moreno's 'El Burrito Sabanero', Welcomed Update To A Holiday Song
teaser: "Mi Burrito Sabanero" is about a little donkey making its way to Bethlehem on the night Jesus was born. We hear about a reimagined version of the classic Latin American Christmas song by Gaby Moreno.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
